title: website: weekly.golang.org doesn't show all of package os/user
body:
The weekly.golang.org godoc instance doesn't seem to show all of the user package.  It's
missing the lookup_unix.go file & its funcs (Lookup and LookupId)

compare:
http://weekly.golang.org/pkg/os/user/

vs.
http://localhost:6060/pkg/os/user/ (when running local godoc -http=:6060)
